actions.recommendation: ECG: Normal sinus rhythm with ventricular extrasystoles on resting ECG, no inducible ischaemia, normal stress response
Eat a whole food, anti-inflammatory diet, Check for hidden infections and allergies, address any gut issues, exercise regularly, practice deep relaxation, sleep for 8 hours every night

Abdominal circumference is not limited to fat under the skin but also around the organs of your abdomen, linked with Type 2 diabetes, high BP& breathing problems. Eat whole unprocessed foods, get good sleep ,try manage stress
Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear
